`... Three of them­ one they put here, there on the east side; another
here in the middle; another there on the west side, that also' (Ngandi,

The crocodile and the shark fought.

`We got black plums and green plums.' (Ngandi, Heath 1978: 128)
`We got black plums and green plums.' (Ngandi, Heath 1978: 128)
We got black plums and green plums.

tier.item: My father and I will go.
